name: Chicken Scratch (muanua-lab)
description:
Story 

Chicken is weak

Chicken is a coward

Chicken is always a prey

But now is the time to retaliate against the gangsters, make them know who is the master of chick-fu  🐔🤜

What is chicken scratch?

Action game blend with unpredictable ragdoll, you can defeat enemies with a single scratch, Maintain your drifting and unleash the wrath of chicken

 

Controls Developer’s note

This is an experimental game. your feedback is valuable for us to consider becoming a commercial game. however, we’re open to publisher or investor

We intended to invent a creative game like an experimental laboratory

Follow us for more experiment games (in the future)

@muanua_lab

Thanks for playing 

and Don’t underestimate a chicken
